typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		BillToCustomerID as integer,
		CustomerCategoryID as integer,
		BuyingGroupID as integer,
		PrimaryContactPersonID as integer,
		AlternateContactPersonID as integer,
		DeliveryMethodID as integer,
		DeliveryCityID as integer,
		PostalCityID as integer,
		CreditLimit as decimal(18,2),
		AccountOpenedDate as date,
		StandardDiscountPercentage as decimal(18,3),
		IsStatementSent as boolean,
		IsOnCreditHold as boolean,
		PaymentDays as integer,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		DeliveryRun as string,
		RunPosition as string,
		WebsiteURL as string,
		DeliveryAddressLine1 as string,
		DeliveryAddressLine2 as string,
		DeliveryPostalCode as string,
		DeliveryLocation as binary,
		PostalAddressLine1 as string,
		PostalAddressLine2 as string,
		PostalPostalCode as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> odsDB
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		CustomerName as string,
		BillToCustomerID as integer,
		CustomerCategoryID as integer,
		BuyingGroupID as integer,
		PrimaryContactPersonID as integer,
		AlternateContactPersonID as integer,
		DeliveryMethodID as integer,
		DeliveryCityID as integer,
		PostalCityID as integer,
		CreditLimit as decimal(18,2),
		AccountOpenedDate as date,
		StandardDiscountPercentage as decimal(18,3),
		IsStatementSent as boolean,
		IsOnCreditHold as boolean,
		PaymentDays as integer,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		DeliveryRun as string,
		RunPosition as string,
		WebsiteURL as string,
		DeliveryAddressLine1 as string,
		DeliveryAddressLine2 as string,
		DeliveryPostalCode as string,
		DeliveryLocation as binary,
		PostalAddressLine1 as string,
		PostalAddressLine2 as string,
		PostalPostalCode as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> intergrationDB
odsDB derive(IsActive = 1) ~> addingisactive
odsDB, Select3 lookup(CustomerID == SQL_CustomerID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_CustomerID)) ~> existingRow
Select4 derive(SQL_IsActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
intergrationDB select(mapColumn(
		SQL_CustomerID = CustomerID,
		SQL_CustomerName = CustomerName,
		SQL_BillToCustomerID = BillToCustomerID,
		SQL_CustomerCategoryID = CustomerCategoryID,
		SQL_BuyingGroupID = BuyingGroupID,
		SQL_PrimaryContactPersonID = PrimaryContactPersonID,
		SQL_AlternateContactPersonID = AlternateContactPersonID,
		SQL_DeliveryMethodID = DeliveryMethodID,
		SQL_DeliveryCityID = DeliveryCityID,
		SQL_PostalCityID = PostalCityID,
		SQL_CreditLimit = CreditLimit,
		SQL_AccountOpenedDate = AccountOpenedDate,
		SQL_StandardDiscountPercentage = StandardDiscountPercentage,
		SQL_IsStatementSent = IsStatementSent,
		SQL_IsOnCreditHold = IsOnCreditHold,
		SQL_PaymentDays = PaymentDays,
		SQL_PhoneNumber = PhoneNumber,
		SQL_FaxNumber = FaxNumber,
		SQL_DeliveryRun = DeliveryRun,
		SQL_RunPosition = RunPosition,
		SQL_WebsiteURL = WebsiteURL,
		SQL_DeliveryAddressLine1 = DeliveryAddressLine1,
		SQL_DeliveryAddressLine2 = DeliveryAddressLine2,
		SQL_DeliveryPostalCode = DeliveryPostalCode,
		SQL_DeliveryLocation = DeliveryLocation,
		SQL_PostalAddressLine1 = PostalAddressLine1,
		SQL_PostalAddressLine2 = PostalAddressLine2,
		SQL_PostalPostalCode = PostalPostalCode,
		SQL_LastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom = ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo = ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive = IsActive,
		Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
existingRow select(mapColumn(
		SQL_CustomerID,
		SQL_CustomerName,
		SQL_BillToCustomerID,
		SQL_CustomerCategoryID,
		SQL_BuyingGroupID,
		SQL_PrimaryContactPersonID,
		SQL_AlternateContactPersonID,
		SQL_DeliveryMethodID,
		SQL_DeliveryCityID,
		SQL_PostalCityID,
		SQL_CreditLimit,
		SQL_AccountOpenedDate,
		SQL_StandardDiscountPercentage,
		SQL_IsStatementSent,
		SQL_IsOnCreditHold,
		SQL_PaymentDays,
		SQL_PhoneNumber,
		SQL_FaxNumber,
		SQL_DeliveryRun,
		SQL_RunPosition,
		SQL_WebsiteURL,
		SQL_DeliveryAddressLine1,
		SQL_DeliveryAddressLine2,
		SQL_DeliveryPostalCode,
		SQL_DeliveryLocation,
		SQL_PostalAddressLine1,
		SQL_PostalAddressLine2,
		SQL_PostalPostalCode,
		SQL_LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive,
		Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
addingisactive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> intergrationCity
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Surrogate'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SQL_CustomerID,
		SQL_CustomerName,
		SQL_BillToCustomerID,
		SQL_CustomerCategoryID,
		SQL_BuyingGroupID,
		SQL_PrimaryContactPersonID,
		SQL_AlternateContactPersonID,
		SQL_DeliveryMethodID,
		SQL_DeliveryCityID,
		SQL_PostalCityID,
		SQL_CreditLimit,
		SQL_AccountOpenedDate,
		SQL_StandardDiscountPercentage,
		SQL_IsStatementSent,
		SQL_IsOnCreditHold,
		SQL_PaymentDays,
		SQL_PhoneNumber,
		SQL_FaxNumber,
		SQL_DeliveryRun,
		SQL_RunPosition,
		SQL_WebsiteURL,
		SQL_DeliveryAddressLine1,
		SQL_DeliveryAddressLine2,
		SQL_DeliveryPostalCode,
		SQL_DeliveryLocation,
		SQL_PostalAddressLine1,
		SQL_PostalAddressLine2,
		SQL_PostalPostalCode,
		SQL_LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive,
		Surrogate
	)) ~> sink1
